duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize and expand drafting skills in a multi-disciplined team environment to prepare design drawings based on design input.
Apply computer-aided drafting skills and receive hands-on training in 3D design software environments.
Create master sketches to scale showing relation of proposed installations to existing facilities and exact specifications and dimensions.
Accompany and assist experienced designers on walkdowns at client facilities to gather information for design projects.
Interface with vendors and construction contractors, explain drawings so appropriate design adjustments can be made.

education_certification.credential: Associate's Degree in a technical area including drafting or a high school diploma and equivalent technical design experience (no formal degree required)
Knowledge of design techniques, tools, and principals involved in production of technical plans, drawings, and models
